publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6884 Stuart McMillan: Pipe Band Champion of Champions 2010—That the Parliament congratulates Field Marshall Montgomery on being crowned pipe band Champion of Champions for 2010; notes the band’s consistency over the five pipe majors that saw them take the title for a second consecutive year; further notes the high level of competition and skill demonstrated by all the bands that participated in this year’s competition, and wishes Field Marshall Montgomery every success for future championships. Supported by: Elaine Smith*, Jamie McGrigor*, Sandra White*, Alasdair Allan*, Nanette Milne*, Bob Doris*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Anne McLaughlin*, Angela Constance*, Bill Kidd*, Stewart Maxwell*
